segments.text: Can I see some men's watches ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . How about this one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What functions does this watch have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a luminous watch with a time-reminder function .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and it comes with a worldwide guarantee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll take it . Please set the watch for me .
segments.speaker: S1
